title: Paramour Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Prices on Their Inventory of Tickets for Paramour at the Lyric Theatre in New York
text:
CapitalCityTickets.com have made Paramour theatre tickets affordable to Broadway fans. The popular theatre show is playing at the Lyric Theatre in New York City. Online ticket clients can use promo code CITY5 to save 5% on already slashed ticket prices.
Paramour tickets are always a popular and highly searched for event ticket. Paramour will be showing at the Lyric Theatre in New York City. Previews on April 16, 2016 and officially open on June 2nd. CapitalCityTickets.com stocks all levels of seating and price ranges to all Paramour shows!
Set in the world of Golden Age Hollywood, the event will spin the tale of a beautiful young poet forced to choose between love and art. Directed by Philippe Decouflé, Paramour will feature a 38-member cast that blends the best in circus arts and will be announced shortly.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a wide selection of Paramour theatre tickets. They also offer a safe online buying experience for Paramour tickets.
Save time and money with CapitalCityTickets.com.
